Package net.mtrop.doom.map.data

Class DoomLinedef

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.mtrop.doom.map.data.DoomLinedef
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BinaryObject
    public class DoomLinedef
extends Object
implements BinaryObject
    Doom/Boom 14-byte format implementation of Linedef.
    Author:
    Matthew Tropiano
